      8 #include "fs.h"
      9 
     10 #include <limits.h>
     11 #include <sys/inotify.h>
     12 #include <unistd.h>
     13 
     14 namespace {
     15     int fd = -1;
     16     int wd = -1;
     17 }
     18 
     19 fswatcher::fswatcher(const std::string &path) : path_(path) {
     20     if ((fd = inotify_init()) > 0) {
     21         wd = inotify_add_watch(fd, path.c_str(), IN_ATTRIB | IN_CLOSE_WRITE | IN_MOVE_SELF);
     22     }
     23 }
     24 
     25 fswatcher::~fswatcher() {
     26     if (fd != -1) {
     27         close(fd);
     28     }
     29 }
     30 
     31 bool fswatcher::wait_for_event() {
     32     struct inotify_event event;
     33     int n = 0;
     34 
     35     if (fd == -1 || wd == -1) {
     36         return false;
     37     }
     38 
     39     // The read syscall is blocking; it returns after one eligible event (i.e., matching the mask) is received.
     40     while (n <= 0) {
     41         n = read(fd, &event, sizeof(struct inotify_event) + NAME_MAX + 1);
     42     }
     43 
     44     return true;
     45 }
